org.contentmine.pdf2svg

Class AMIFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.pdf2svg.AMIFont

  • public class AMIFont
extends java.lang.Object
    wrapper for PDType1Font. is meant to manage the bad Fontnames, other fontTypes, etc and try to convert them to a standard approach. Splits all Italic, etc. to attributes of AMIFont. May ultimately be unneccessary
    Author:
    pm286
